S08abhnispu:1_0: jyotibhir vijitaṃ yad asya jagatīṃ jiṣṇv antaratvatamo (?)
S08abhnispu:1_1: yac cādvaitadaśārṇasaty api parīṇāmo guṇaughaḥ śriyām /
S08abhnispu:1_4: tair etac caritādbhutāni nijadhīdhāmāni dhāvantu vaḥ //
S08abhnispu:3_0: tadañcitais tadvacanirmitaughair amogham agryāṃ śriyam ādadhātu //
S08abhnispu:4_0: iha hi mṛdumadhyakramābhyāṃ subhāvitasamādher adhimātraprajñasya bhagavatā /
S08abhnispu:6_0: sa hi tvāṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca vajradharatvaṃ prāpayitum abhyutsāhavān skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ pratibimbamayaṃ śūnyataikarasaṃ niścinvan /
S08abhnispu:6_1: prabhāsvaraṃ praviśya jhatiti saparikarakūṭāgarodaramaṇḍalamāṇḍaleyaparikaritaḥ kuleśabhūṣito [Am_225] hṛdbījayuktaḥ śūnyatākaruṇaikarasamahāsukhamayaḥ śrīvajrasattvamañjuvajrādirūpo 'parimitatathāgatadevībodhisattvakrodhādīn sphārayet /
S08abhnispu:6_2: dharmadeśanādibhir yathābhavyaṃ parahitāni kurvāṇaḥ parapuṇyāvadhiṃ sthāpayan saṃharaṃś cācintya mūrtir udeti /
S08abhnispu:7_0: tatrāyaṃ parikarādiḥ / ārasātalam abhimataprasarā ghanaikasārā jvalantī vajramayī bhūmiḥ kalpāntajvalanavanamayūkhajvālāvalīsīmābandhā /
S08abhnispu:7_1: ārasātalam upary atyuccair ghananibuḍajvaladvajraprākārordhve niḥsaṃdhyekakhaṇḍībhūtam upari vajraśarajālādho vajravitānamaṇḍitaṃ jvaladvajrapañjaraṃ tadabhyantarasthitaviśvābjasūryasthapītadakṣiṇāvartabhramaddaśāracakraṃ ca 61 /
S08abhnispu:8_1: tatra pūrvasyām ārāyāṃ yamāntakaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sitaraktamukhaḥ kṛṣṇavajramudgarakhaḍgamaṇikamaladhārī /
S08abhnispu:9_1: tatroṣṇīṣaṭakkyacalasumbhā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇā lalitā īṣaddarśitadaṃṣṭrā vigataśmaśravaḥ /
S08abhnispu:9_2: tadanye vikṛtarūpāḥ sabhrūbhaṅgāḥ piṅgordhvakeśabhrūśmaśravo vyāvṛttadaṃṣṭrākarālavaktrā lalajjihvā aṭṭāṭṭahāsinaḥ krūrāṣṭanāgabhūṣanā vāmanāḥ pīnās tundilāḥ /
S08abhnispu:9_3: daśāpy ete sahāsanair niścalāḥ pratyālīḍhenārāgreṣv īṣadalagnaviśvābjasūryasthāḥ sūryaprabhāḥ saroṣaṇā jvalanto nadanto 'tibhīmāḥ pralayānalapratimamayūkhamukhair aparimitātmakamūrtinirmāṇaiś ca niravadhidhātutrayeṣu vighnaugham akhilam asakṛnnirmūlayantaḥ /
S08abhnispu:9_5: mukhaṃ tu mūlaṃ śariravarṇaṃ savyavāmaṃ ca yathoktavarṇaṃ pratimukhaṃ raktavartulanetratrayam /
S08abhnispu:10_1: cakraṃ cātibhramaṇān niścalopamaṃ nirantaraṃ sphurad anekajvālākalāpaṃ tasya nābhyantare 'dhaḥsūkopari viśālatrikoṇadhavaladharmodayāntaradhaḥkoṇodaragataviśvadalakamalopari viśvakuliśasahitā tadvajrasya digārā yathāyogaṃ vairocanādisamavarṇā vedī ca /
S08abhnispu:10_3: tasya madhye bhagavān vajrasattvo mañjuvajrarūpaḥ kuṅkumāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravadanaḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgito 'siśarendīvaracāpadharo ratnamukuṭī vicitraratnādyābharaṇo 'nantābhaḥ /
S08abhnispu:10_4: tasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi vairocanaḥ sitaḥ kṛṣṇaraktasavyetaramukhaḥ sitāṣṭāracakrāsimaṇikamaladharaḥ /
S08abhnispu:10_8: trayo 'mī kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravaktrāḥ sarve tathāgatā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇāḥ /
S08abhnispu:10_10: nairṛtyāṃ [Am_229] māmakī akṣobhyasamā raktotpalāsimaṇipadmadharā sarvasādhaneṣu tathā pāṭhāt /
S08abhnispu:11_0: ato garbhapuṭād bahir āgneyakoṇe rūpavajrā vairocanasadṛśī ratnadarpaṇāsimaṇyabjadharā /
S08abhnispu:13_1: atra mañjuvajravairocanadaśadevyaś candreṣu vajraparyaṅkiṇo 'nye sūryeṣu candrasūryataleṣu viśvapadmāni /
S08abhnispu:13_2: tathāgatāḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgitā devyas tu svābham upāyam /
S08abhnispu:15_0: vajrasattvo 'treṣadraktānuviddhasitavarṇo nīlaraktasavyetaravaktraḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgito nīlavajrāsimaṇikamaladhārī viśvapadmacandrāsanaś candraprabho vajraparyaṅkī ratnamukuṭī ratnābharaṇo 'kṣobhyamudritaḥ /
S08abhnispu:16_0: iha mañjuvajrasya stanāntare samayasattvasadṛśaṃ jñānasattvaṃ taddhṛccandre khaḍgamuṣṭicandrasthaṃ maṃbījam /
S08abhnispu:16_1: śāśvataratneśāmitābhāmoghasiddhyakṣobhyānāṃ hṛdi cihne yathāyogaṃ candre sūrye vā vuṃ āṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ /
S08abhnispu:16_2: locanādidevīnāṃ Ioṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ khaṃ raṃ /
S08abhnispu:16_3: krodhānāṃ hūṃ / sarvadevatānāṃ hṛdayamantrā vajrāvalyāṃ uktāḥ /
S08abhnispu:17_1: iha niṣpannayoginaś cakṣurādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jñānasattvapraveśādikaṃ ca noktam /
S08abhnispu:17_2: / tadantareṇāpy aparimitācintyacakṣurabhijñādiguṇagrāmaramaṇīyamūrter abhīṣṭadevatāyāḥ sakṛd eva supariśuddhasarvākārapariniṣpatter muhur muhur adhimokṣadārḍhyāt /
S08abhnispu:17_4: / yadā tu madhye 'nyas tathāgato bhavati nāyakas tadā madhyasthitas tasya sthāne tiṣṭhet /
S08abhnispu:17_5: amitābhaḥ śubhro 'pi bhavati śuklā dharmāḥ prakṛtyeti vāgīśasyātra śuklatety ukteḥ /
S08abhnispu:17_6: / iha vakṣyamāneṣu ca mandaleṣu yasyā māṇḍaleyadevatāyā mukhyato yatsthānam ucyate tasmin saiva pradhānatayā maṇḍaleśabhimukhī /
S08abhnispu:18_0: atra kūṭāgārasya vajrabhūmyādiparito vajrapañjaraṃ rakṣācakraṃ dharmodayā ceti trayaḥ parikarāḥ /
S08abhnispu:18_1: tatra vajrapañjaraṃ vakṣyamānānām api sarveṣāṃ kūṭāgārāṇāṃ rakṣācakraṃ [Am_232] dharmodayā ca keṣāṃcid eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
S08abhnispu:18_2: lekhyakūṭāgārāṇāṃ tu dharmadhātusvarūpadharmodayāyā dharmadhātvantargatasya vā sūcakaṃ likhanam uktaṃ vajrāvalyām /
S08abhnispu:18_3: / yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmam ity utpannakramamaṇḍalapratipādanākṛtena lokadhātoś cakravāḍasūcakaṃ vajrāvalīlikhanaṃ ca niyamenaiva /
S08abhnispu:18_6: api ca śūnyataiva bhagavatī nikhilavighnaughaṃ samūlam unmūlayituṃ prabhavatīti tadadhimokṣadṛḍhatvam evādarotpādanāya rakṣācakralikhanaṃ na varṇitaṃ lekhyamaṇḍaleṣu /
S08abhnispu:18_7: bhāvyamaṇḍaleṣu tu kvacid eva tadbhāvanoktā na sarveṣu /
S08abhnispu:18_8: vighnaghātānantaraṃ śūnyatāpraveśād bhāvyamaṇḍale 'pi rakṣācakraṃ nāsty ato na likhyate caitat /
S08abhnispu:18_9: evaṃ tarhi vajraprākāram api cakravāḍasūcakaṃ na likhitavyam /
S08abhnispu:18_11: nahi bhagavatā vajraprākārasya dvitīyavārotpattiḥ kvacid uktā /
S08abhnispu:19_0: kiṃ vā dvir utpattyā / sakṛd utpannam eva hi vajrabhūbandhaprākārādikaṃ samastasamāropaśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ māyāmayam avatiṣṭhata eva /
S08abhnispu:19_2: kaiścit tu kvacid rakṣācakram api likhituṃ saṃmanyate /
